settings.title: About MeTime
settings.text: MeTime advocates on spending quality time on your own and functional health benefits to nourish your body at the same time. We would like to know you better so as to better recommend a tea suitable for your need. You could simply click on "Take The Quiz" below and a recommended tea will be shown to you at the end.

settings.paragraph_text: Celebrate the new year with our well designed products for yourself and for your loved ones.

settings.title: Tea Meditation
settings.text: Tea meditation involves being mindful and present during all aspects of the tea ritual, including making the tea, drinking the tea and being aware of the effects on the mind and body. It has many benefits such as decreased stress and anxiety, increased sense of calm and focus, improved mental health, peaceful way to start your day and all the benefits from drinking tea. For more information you could check out "Alomoves".
